sentence: Estee Lauder Companies, Inc. ( EL ) will begin trading ex-dividend on November 29, 2017.
A cash dividend payment of $0.38 per share is scheduled to be paid on December 15, 2017.
Shareholders who purchased EL prior to the ex-dividend date are eligible for the cash dividend payment.
This represents an 11.76% increase over prior dividend payment.
At the current stock price of $125.15, the dividend yield is 1.21%.
The previous trading day's last sale of EL was $125.15, representing a -1.45% decrease from the 52 week high of $126.99 and a 66.21% increase over the 52 week low of $75.30.
EL is a part of the Consumer Non-Durables sector, which includes companies such as Procter & Gamble Company ( PG ) and Unilever NV ( UN ).
EL's current earnings per share, an indicator of a company's profitability, is $3.7.
Zacks Investment Research reports EL's forecasted earnings growth in 2018 as 19.86%, compared to an industry average of 11.7%.
For more information on the declaration, record and payment dates, visit the EL Dividend History page.
Our Dividend Calendar has the full list of stocks that have an ex-dividend today.
